location.mountain: Mt. Kunlun (Kunlunshan / 昆崙山) - The 'Ancestor of Ten Thousand Mountains'.
location.geography: Remote, high altitude, mystical atmosphere. Far west of the Central Plains.

heritage.founder: Legendary figures (He Zudao etc. depending on lore).
heritage.philosophy: Taoist. Pursuit of immortality and dragon/sky imagery.
heritage.trait: Mysterious and powerful. Often disconnected from daily worldly affairs.

status.tier: Major Sect (One of the Nine Great Sects).
status.political_role: Guardian of the West. Often deals with threats from the Demonic Cult (Xinjiang is nearby).

combat_style.visuals: Lots of jumping/air combat capabilities. Dragon-shaped Qi.

signature_ultimate.name: 운룡대팔식 (Cloud Dragon Great Eight Forms / 雲龍大八式)
signature_ultimate.description: The ultimate movement technique allowing the user to step on air and change direction mid-flight.

list: 상청무상검신공 (Supreme Clarity Formless Sword Divine Art)
건곤오행장 (Heaven and Earth Five Elements Palm)

role: The sect with the best movement techniques (Qinggong).
Usually aloof and arrogant due to their remote location.
The first line of defense against the Demonic Cult's eastern expansion.
